availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Hulda G. Robinson. Father of Samuel Robinson, Mary Robinson, Virginia Robinson, Sylvanus Robinson, Tennessee Robinson, Graves Robinson, and William Robinson. Carpenter in Bedford County, Tennessee, in 1850. Carpenter in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Bedford County, District 4, p. 113A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollards Tan Yard, p. 149.
Find A Grave, "William Robinson (1821-1894)," Memorial #18546382, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/18546382 (accessed April 5, 2021).
